One of the key components provided by Bootstrap is Pagination and Breadcrumbs. Pagination allows users to navigate through multiple pages of content, while Breadcrumbs provide a hierarchical navigation trail. This documentation will guide you on how to implement Pagination and Breadcrumbs using Bootstrap 5.3. ### Objective and Scope The objective of this documentation is to provide step-by-step instructions on implementing Pagination and Breadcrumbs using Bootstrap 5.3. The scope of this documentation covers the basic usage and customization options available for Pagination and Breadcrumbs. ### Requirements and Pre-requisites To follow this documentation, you will need the following: - Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript - Bootstrap 5.3 installed in your project - A text editor or an integrated development environment (IDE) ### Step-by-Step Instructions 1.
